metadata.title: CVE-2024-11498 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: There exists a stack buffer overflow in libjxl. A specifically-crafted filecan cause the JPEG XL decoder to use large amounts of stack space (up to256mb is possible, maybe 512mb), potentially exhausting the stack. Anattacker can craft a file that will cause excessive memory usage. Werecommend upgrading past commit 65fbec56bc578b6b6ee02a527be70787bbd053b0.

criterions.comment: jpeg-xl package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
